Systems Thinking

Notes on thinking about systems.

Key Concepts

  1. Feedback loops - Both reinforcing and balancing
  2. Emergence - Whole greater than parts
  3. Non-linearity - Small changes, big effects

Resources

  • “Thinking in Systems” by Donella Meadows
  • The Fifth Discipline

See also: go-learning for applying systems thinking to code.
